response.overview: In this double-music video co-produced and written by brother and sister, Jeremy (18) & Valerie Abboud (14), as well as Mikael Conde (Midway with Woody Harrelson, Fatman), an eccentric aristocrat invites four guests to a weekend at his manor, but things quickly take a turn for the worst. The film is also aided by assistant producer Kyle Meagher (TIFF alumni, Anne With an E). It is already an official selection at Orlando Film Festival, and the 2nd part has been nominated at South Texas International Film Festival.
response.title: Another One Like You/Without You
